title: Summoner ICONÂ´s fehlen
body:
Hallo, kann es sein, dass summoner icon fehlen?

Oder wurden icons aus saison  4 raus gepatcht ? 

Ich vermisse icons aus saison 2 3 und 4 :/{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

LG

replies.body: Bitte nur English hier und ja sie wurden aus dem Shop genommen, kann man aber noch benutzen wenn man sie besitzt.

hey... whats up.

Thank you for your answer.

But I was saison 4 Diamond and got a diamond ICON, and now this is gone...


anyone knows why ?

I was inaktiv since saison 4...

Looking at your account it looks like the account was punished for unfair methods being used on it, which can actually remove all ranked rewards. <:( If you were not the one playing your account, then it sounds like you've got a compromise on your hands!

As soon as possible, without logging in, [**open a ticket for account recovery**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) on our Support site for EU to get this looked into or more context on the punishment.
